name: Gangsta Hero
description:
noticeWhat you are buying is not the complete finished product of the game, because the visual novel game will be made in a way of continuous update, your purchase will be the biggest support to the author, thank you very much!
introMany years later, now that you have just graduated from college
you recall your high school deskmate and still have regrets
Why did you reject her confession then... Now I know how much I like her
Now far to the ocean, came to a strange city named Kovo,
Only to study abroad to show her own heart
Success or failure, as long as...... Just say it,
Like she did back then
In the city of Corvo,
you saved the life of an old man who was passed out in front of you
Claiming to be the world's number one killer
And forced to accept you as an apprentice, see in his readily can throw up the amount of bank cards,
You have no choice but to promise him
However, master do not know why, but he insisted on joining the local gang
By a strange combination of circumstances, he also became a bodyguard for the proud lady of the gang
Suddenly, ordinary life no longer seems ordinary
Gangster and killer, money and girl, one after another
The city is not as peaceful as it was when you were a normal person
......
